sql.if: and t.fhdzid IN (SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZID = #{fhdzid} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID)
and t.mhdzid IN (SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZID = #{mhdzid} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID)

if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.dwmc dwmc, t.dwxz dwxz, t.dwdz dwdz, t.dwgk dwgk, t.xzqh xzqh, t.zbdh zbdh, t.fhdj fhdj, t.fhdzid fhdzid, t.fhdzmc fhdzmc, t.mhdzid mhdzid, t.mhdzmc mhdzmc, t.xfzrr xfzrr, t.xfzrrdh xfzrrdh, t.xfglr xfglr, t.xfglrdh xfglrdh, t.xfsssl xfsssl, t.jzfl jzfl, t.jzsl jzsl, t.zdmj zdmj, t.jzmj jzmj, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.plqkd plqkd, t.plqkn plqkn, t.plqkx plqkx, t.plqkb plqkb, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

WITH TEMP_XFDW AS( SELECT ZDDWID,COUNT(1) XFDWLXMC FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY ZDDWID ) SELECT , C2.CODE_NAME DWXZMC, C4.CODE_NAME XZQHMC, C6.CODE_NAME JZFLMC, C8.CODE_NAME FHDJMC, C9.DZJC MHDZIDMC, CASE WHEN C11.XFDWLXMC IS NOT NULL THEN '有' ELSE'无' END XFDWLXMC FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW T LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST C1 ON C1.CODETYPE = 'DWXZ' AND C1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL C2 ON C1.CODEID = C2.CODEID AND C2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T.DWXZ = C2.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST C3 ON C3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' AND C3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL C4 ON C3.CODEID = C4.CODEID AND C4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T.XZQH = C4.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST C5 ON C5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' AND C5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL C6 ON C5.CODEID = C6.CODEID AND C6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T.JZFL = C6.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST C7 ON C7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' AND C7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL C8 ON C7.CODEID = C8.CODEID AND C8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND T.FHDJ = C8.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ C9 ON T.MHDZID = C9.DZID AND C9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN TEMP_XFDW C11 ON T.UUID = C11.ZDDWID INNER JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c10 ON t.MHDZID=c10.DZID AND c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE T.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND C11.XFDWLXMC IS NOT NULL
AND C11.XFDWLXMC IS NULL
ORDER BY NVL(t.xgsj,t.cjsj) DESC

select t.DWMC,t.DWXZ,t.DWDZ,t.ZBDH, t.xzqh xzqh,t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY,c2.CODE_NAME dwxzmc from YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DWXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWXZ = c2.CODE_VALUE where 1=1

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME dwxzmc, c4.CODE_NAME xzqhmc, c6.CODE_NAME jzflmc, c8.CODE_NAME fhdjmc, c9.DZMC mhdzidmc, c10.DZMC fhdzidmc, CASE(SELECT COUNT(t2.UUID) FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL t2 WHERE t2.ZDDWID = t.UUID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHEN 0 THEN '无' ELSE '有' END AS xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DWXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWXZ = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.JZFL = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.FHDJ = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.dzid AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c10 ON (t.FHDZID=c10.dzid AND c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW(uuid,dwmc,dwxz,dwdz,dwgk,xzqh,zbdh,fhdj,fhdzid,fhdzmc,mhdzid,mhdzmc,xfzrr,xfzrrdh,xfglr,xfglrdh,xfsssl,jzfl,jzsl,zdmj,jzmj,gis_x,gis_y,lon,lat,plqkd,plqkn,plqkx,plqkb,bz,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fhdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfzrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfzrrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfglr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfglrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfsssl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{plqkd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW(uuid,dwmc,dwlb,dwclsj,dwdz,dzlj,dzh,dwgk,xzqh,zbdh,yzbm,dzyx,gdzc,zgrs,fhdj,fhdzid,fhdzmc,mhdzid,mhdzmc,xfzrr,xfzrrsfz,xfzrrdh,xfglr,xfglrsfz,xfglrdh,xfdwlx,xfdwrs,xfdwcls,xfdwlxr,xfdwdh,xfdwbz,xfsssl,jzfl,jzsl,zdmj,jzmj,gis_x,gis_y,lon,lat,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwmc,#{item.dwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwlb,#{item.dwclsj,jdbcType=DATE} dwclsj,#{item.dwdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwdz,#{item.dzlj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlj,#{item.dzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzh,#{item.dwgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwgk,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.zbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbdh,#{item.yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yzbm,#{item.dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzyx,#{item.gdzc,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gdzc,#{item.zgrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zgrs,#{item.fhdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdj,#{item.fhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdzid,#{item.fhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fhdzmc,#{item.mhdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mhdzid,#{item.mhdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mhdzmc,#{item.xfzrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrr,#{item.xfzrrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrrsfz,#{item.xfzrrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfzrrdh,#{item.xfglr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglr,#{item.xfglrsfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglrsfz,#{item.xfglrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfglrdh,#{item.xfdwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwlx,#{item.xfdwrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfdwrs,#{item.xfdwcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfdwcls,#{item.xfdwlxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwlxr,#{item.xfdwdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwdh,#{item.xfdwbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfdwbz,#{item.xfsssl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfsssl,#{item.jzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzfl,#{item.jzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jzsl,#{item.zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zdmj,#{item.jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jzmj,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y,#{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lon,#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lat,#{item.blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxd,#{item.blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxn,#{item.blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxx,#{item.blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxb,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), dwmc = VALUES(dwmc), dwlb = VALUES(dwlb), dwclsj = VALUES(dwclsj), dwdz = VALUES(dwdz), dzlj = VALUES(dzlj), dzh = VALUES(dzh), dwgk = VALUES(dwgk), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), zbdh = VALUES(zbdh), yzbm = VALUES(yzbm), dzyx = VALUES(dzyx), gdzc = VALUES(gdzc), zgrs = VALUES(zgrs), fhdj = VALUES(fhdj), fhdzid = VALUES(fhdzid), fhdzmc = VALUES(fhdzmc), mhdzid = VALUES(mhdzid), mhdzmc = VALUES(mhdzmc), xfzrr = VALUES(xfzrr), xfzrrsfz = VALUES(xfzrrsfz), xfzrrdh = VALUES(xfzrrdh), xfglr = VALUES(xfglr), xfglrsfz = VALUES(xfglrsfz), xfglrdh = VALUES(xfglrdh), xfdwlx = VALUES(xfdwlx), xfdwrs = VALUES(xfdwrs), xfdwcls = VALUES(xfdwcls), xfdwlxr = VALUES(xfdwlxr), xfdwdh = VALUES(xfdwdh), xfdwbz = VALUES(xfdwbz), xfsssl = VALUES(xfsssl), jzfl = VALUES(jzfl), jzsl = VALUES(jzsl), zdmj = VALUES(zdmj), jzmj = VALUES(jzmj), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y), lon = VALUES(lon), lat = VALUES(lat), blgxd = VALUES(blgxd), blgxn = VALUES(blgxn), blgxx = VALUES(blgxx), blgxb = VALUES(blgxb), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME dwxzmc, c4.CODE_NAME xzqhmc, c6.CODE_NAME jzflmc, c8.CODE_NAME fhdjmc, c9.DZMC mhdzidmc, CASE(SELECT COUNT(t2.UUID) FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL t2 WHERE t2.ZDDWID = t.UUID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHEN 0 THEN '无' ELSE '有' END AS xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDDWLB' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DWXZ = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.JZFL = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'FHDJ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.FHDJ = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.DZID AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
INNER JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c10 ON (t.MHDZID=c10.DZID AND c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND c10.dzbm LIKE concat(RTRIM(#{mhdzbm},0),'%'))
WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
) t where rownum <= 20
and t.mhdzidmc = #{mhdzidmc}
ORDER BY XZQH,DWXZ,DWMC ASC

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.zddwid zddwid, t.xfdwlx xfdwlx, t.xfdwrs xfdwrs, t.xfdwcls xfdwcls, t.xfdwlxr xfdwlxr, t.xfdwdh xfdwdh, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name xfdwlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xfdwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zddwid = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND dwmc = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL(uuid,zddwid,xfdwlx,xfdwrs,xfdwcls,xfdwlxr,xfdwdh,bz,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfdwcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfdwlxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdwdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE t.ZDDWID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ(uuid,zddwid,jzid,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE ZDDWID = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT t.UUId,t.ZDDWID,t.JZID,t2.JZMC,t2.JZLX FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX t2 ON t.JZID=t2.JZID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='N' AND t.ZDDWID = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW_XFLL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE t.UUID = #{value}
UPDATE YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE t.UUID = #{value}
